author: jwoolley
msg: Fix a bug in #if and #elif whereby mod_include would not
notice premature EOF's while looking for the "expr=" tag.

author: wrowe
msg: Clear up a signed/unsigned comparison and assignment.

author: wrowe
msg: Introduce earlier identification of command.com v.s. cmd.exe
for Win32 .bat/.cmd scripts, and assure we treat command.com

author: wrowe
msg: Clarify some difficult to read code by modifying comments
to express the current behavior, and deprecate some long

author: wrowe
msg: Pass the command line to the cmd.exe /c interpreter double quoted.
This fixes a bug that CGI args ending in a double-quote would cause
invocation to fail.  Just fixed the converse problem in Apache 2.0,
where assumed they all acted as cmd.exe, which command.com will not.
